title: Internal compiler error when cross compiling with cross for aarch64

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
This can be reproduced every time on my side. (vmware ubuntu 20 lts x86-64) ### Code ```Rust git clone https://github.com/Fluidex/plonkit then cross build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --release ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b commit-date: 2021-02-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling clap-v3 v3.0.0-beta.1 Compiling bellman_vk_codegen v0.2.0 (https://github.com/Fluidex/solidity_plonk_verifier.git#77588cd4) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'compiler/rustc_resolve/src/imports.rs:1049:33: inconsistent resolution for an import', /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/compiler/rustc_middle/src/util/bug.rs:34:26 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C linker=aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `clap-v3` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` I'm unable to produce even if export RUST_BACKTRACE=1. ```
